articles.author: Dylan Butts
articles.title: Amid Epstein fallout, Bill Gates becomes point of controversy at India AI summit - CNBC
articles.description: Bill Gates has become a point of controversy at a major Indian AI festival this week, amid the fallout of the latest Epstein file release.
articles.content: Bill Gates has become a source of controversy at this week's high-profile India AI Impact Summit, as speculation around his planned keynote address ultimately ended with his withdrawal at the last mi… [+2551 chars]

articles.title: Galaxy S25 gets the One UI 8.5 Beta 5 update - SamMobile
articles.description: Samsung is rolling out a new beta version of One UI 8.5 (Android 16 QPR2) to the Galaxy S25, Galaxy S25+, and the Galaxy S25 Ultra in India. Carrying firmware version ZZAN, this is the fourth beta version of the software in the country, and if released in oth…
